result.reason: The feature does not exist in the application UI (only in Taskbar JumpList and QuickConnect history).
result.approach: Create a RecentConnectionsService to track and persist recent connections (similar to JumpListManager but for in-app use) and add a 'Recently Connected' submenu to the File menu.

The "Recently connected" feature is missing from the application's UI, although `JumpListManager` tracks recent connections for the Windows Taskbar. I will triage this as a P3 enhancement to implement an in-app "Recently Connected" menu. This will involve creating a `RecentConnectionsService` to persist the list and updating `FileMenu` to display it, hooking into connection events to keep it current.
